summary: A compilation of all my new roleplaying races from Rosario + Vampire, transferred to the Nexus.
descriptionHtml:
If any graphic designers and experienced modders are willing to get behind this project as well, I would like some custom textures for the rosario and a better look for the race (one that actually looks like Moka etc.)
Moka's Rosario is located in HelgenKeep01, as shown in the screenshots at the end of Moka's set.
Screenshots are laid out with Mizore first, then Moka, and finally Kurumu, and each set starts with a basic view of the character I designed for it.
As I've had to clear this up many times, these races are not for aesthetics, merely to try and merge the characters' skills with Skyrim mechanics. Since I cannot script or create graphics, I have only used vanilla assets.

Required Mods:
Racial Compatibility

Reccommended Mods:
Cover Women (look 4 is what I have) 
Apachii Skyhair 
RV Vampire Eyes 
Better Vampire Lord Transformation 

CONFIRMED COMPATIBLE: 
All DLC and DLC Unofficial Patches 
Unofficial Skyrim Patch 
High Res Texture Packs and Unofficial High Resolution Patch 
Apachii Hair 
 Skyrim Perk Enhancements and Rebalanced Gameplay (SPERG - for some reason censored on Steam) 
Better Quest Objectives 
ZX Hands 
Better Females by Bella 
Flan's Eyes for Skyrim 
Immersive HUD 
Lovely Hairstyles CE 
Makoka Music 
Mage Books 
Barenziah Quest Markers 
Pure Waters 
Raddioragae's Hair Workshop 1 and 2 
SkyUI 
SMIM 
ZX Eyes 
Harkon's Sword Improvement 
High Hrothgar Express 
The Eyes of Beauty 
Alternate Start - Live another Life 
Yuki-Onna 
More Hair Colours - Dawnguard ver. 
ELFX 
Achieve That! 
numenume Hair 
N_43 Hair Pack
The Dance of Death 
Understandable Draugr 
Wearable Lanterns 
W.A.T.E.R 
BB's Hair Physics Project 
KillerKeo's Skimpy Armour Pack WIP 
Yukata 
Project Sekirei 
Enhanced Brelyna Maryon 
SkyRe and ReProccer 
Weapons and Armour Fix Remade 
Merta+Sottetta+Tembtra with their respective Even Better ZX Armours mods 
 
ALL OF THESE WILL WORK TOGETHER (IF THEY ARE LOADED INTO THE SAME GAME) 

INCOMPATIBLE 
Pure Weather 
Enchanting Awakened SkyRe Perk Tree Merge 
Unofficial Skyrim Redone Patch Update
Realistic Needs and Diseases
POTENTIALLY INCOMPATIBLE
*Apachii SkyHair
